scene.description: [the Avengers are seen attacking an unknown base, and Iron Man bounces off of the base's force field]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Shit!

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Language! JARVIS, what's the view from upstairs?

dialogue.speaker: JARVIS
dialogue.line: The central building is protected by some kind of energy shield. Strucker's technology is well beyond any other Hydra base we've taken.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: Loki's scepter must be here. Strucker couldn't mount this defense without it. At long last.

scene.description: [Natasha knocks out some soldiers]

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: At long last is lasting a little long, boys.

scene.description: [As some soldiers shoot at him]

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Yeah. I think we lost the element of surprise.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Wait a second. No one else is going to deal with the fact that Cap just said "language?"

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: I know.

scene.description: [Steve throws his bike at some soldiers driving up in their truck]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: It just slipped out.

scene.description: [at the HYDRA Research Base, Sokovia, Eastern Europe]

dialogue.speaker: Strucker
dialogue.line: Who gave the order to attack?

dialogue.speaker: Fortress Soldier
dialogue.line: Herr Strucker, it's the Avengers. They landed in the far woods, the perimeter guard panicked.

dialogue.speaker: Strucker
dialogue.line: [to List] They have to be after the scepter. [to the soldier] Can we hold them?

dialogue.speaker: Fortress Soldier
dialogue.line: They're the Avengers...

dialogue.speaker: Strucker
dialogue.line: Deploy the rest of the tanks.

dialogue.speaker: Fortress Soldier
dialogue.line: Yes, sir.

dialogue.speaker: Strucker
dialogue.line: Concentrate fire on the weak ones. A hit can make them close ranks. Everything we've accomplished. But we're on the verge of our greatest breakthrough.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. List
dialogue.line: Then let's show them what we've accomplished. Send out the twins.

dialogue.speaker: Strucker
dialogue.line: It's too soon.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. List
dialogue.line: It's what they signed up for.

dialogue.speaker: Strucker
dialogue.line: My men can hold them.

scene.description: [Stark flies to the HYDRA base to break in]

dialogue.speaker: Jarvis
dialogue.line: Sir, the city is taking fire.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Well, we know Strucker's not going to worry about civilian casualties. Send in the Iron Legion.

dialogue.speaker: Iron Legion
dialogue.line: [The Iron Legion flies in; to the civilians] This quadrant is unsafe. Please back away. We are here to help. This quadrant is unsafe. Please back away. Please back away. We wish to avoid collateral damage and will inform you when this current conflict is resolved. We are here to help.

scene.description: [a man throws a stone at the Iron Legion]

dialogue.speaker: Iron Legion
dialogue.line: We are here to help.

scene.description: [Back at the HYDRA base; to his soldiers]

dialogue.speaker: Strucker
dialogue.line: We will not yield! The Americans sent their circus freaks to test us. We will send them back, in bags. No Surrender!

dialogue.speaker: Soldiers
dialogue.line: No Surrender!

dialogue.speaker: Strucker
dialogue.line: [quietly to List] I am going to surrender. You will delete everything. If we give the Avengers the weapons, they may not look too far into what we've been...

dialogue.speaker: Dr. List
dialogue.line: The twins.

dialogue.speaker: Strucker
dialogue.line: They are not ready to take on...

dialogue.speaker: Dr. List
dialogue.line: No, no. I mean...

scene.description: [He points to where the twins Wanda and Pietro Maximoff were standing but are now gone]

dialogue.speaker: Dr. List
dialogue.line: The Twins.

scene.description: [Pietro speeds through the forest and knocks down Barton]

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: You didn't see that coming?

scene.description: [Pietro zooms off before Clint can shoot him with an arrow, then Barton gets shot at]

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Clint!

scene.description: [Pietro knocks down Steve as he speeds passed him]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: We have an enhanced in the field.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Clint's hit!

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: [Natasha goes over to where Clint is lying down] Somebody want to deal with that bunker?

scene.description: [She sees the Hulk coming to the rescue]

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Thank you.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: [As he's fighting with the soldiers] Stark, we're really need to get inside.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: I'm closing in. JARVIS, am I...closing in? Do you see a power source for that shield?

dialogue.speaker: JARVIS
dialogue.line: There's a pathway below the north tower.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Great, I wanna poke it with something.

scene.description: [Stark blows up the invisible shield on the base]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Drawbridge is down, people.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: [To Steve] The enhanced?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: He's a blur. All the new player's we've faced, I've never seen this. In fact, I still haven't.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Clint's hit pretty bad, guys. We're gonna need evac.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: [To Steve] I can get Barton to the jet. The sooner we're gone the better. You and Stark secure the scepter.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Copy that.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: [Referring to the approaching soldiers in their HYDRA tank] Looks like they're lining up.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Well, they're excited.

scene.description: [Thor pounds on Steve's shield with his hammer and the force knocks down all the soldiers]

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: Find the scepter.

scene.description: [Thor flies off]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: And for gosh sake, watch your language!

scene.description: [Steve sighs]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: That's not going away anytime soon.

scene.description: [Stark enters the HYDRA base and the soldiers start firing at his Iron Man suit]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Guys, stop, we gotta talk about this.

scene.description: [Stark shoots down the soldiers using his suit]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Good talk.

dialogue.speaker: Fortress Soldier
dialogue.line: No it wasn't.

scene.description: [Stark finds List and knocks him out, he then steps out of his Iron Man suit]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Sentry mode.

scene.description: [He walks over to the computers]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Okay, JARVIS. You know I want it all. Make sure you copy Hill at HQ.

scene.description: [With Natasha]

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: We're locked down out here.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Then get to Banner, time for a lullaby. [Back at the HYDRA base]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: I know you're hiding more than files. Hey, J, give me an IR scan of the room, real quick.

dialogue.speaker: JARVIS
dialogue.line: The wall to your left...I'm reading steel reinforcement and an air current.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: [To himself as he walks over to the wall] Please be a secret door, please be a secret door, please be a secret door...

scene.description: [He pushes and the wall opens up]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Yay!

scene.description: [He enters through to a secret passageway]
[Natasha finds the Hulk]

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Hey, big guy. The sun's getting real low.

scene.description: [The Hulk scowls at her, Natasha kneels in front of him and puts out her hand, the Hulk touches her hand and as she strokes his hand slowly he starts to calm down. He stumbles away and changes into Bruce Banner]
[Back at the HYDRA base Steve finds Strucker]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Baron Strucker. Hydra's number one thug.

dialogue.speaker: Strucker
dialogue.line: Technically, I'm a thug for SHIELD.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Well then technically you're unemployed. Where's Loki's scepter?

dialogue.speaker: Strucker
dialogue.line: Don't worry, I know when I'm beat. You'll mention how I cooperated, I hope.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: I'll put it right under illegal human experimentation.

scene.description: [Wanda creeps up behind him]

dialogue.speaker: Steve
dialogue.line: Rogers: How many are there?

scene.description: [Suddenly, Wanda knocks Steve down using her telekinetic powers and quickly leaves]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: We have a second enhanced. Female. Do not engage.

scene.description: [He looks at Strucker]

dialogue.speaker: Strucker
dialogue.line: You'll have to be faster than...

scene.description: [Steve uses his shield to knock out Strucker]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Guys, I got Strucker.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Yeah, I got...something bigger.

scene.description: [Inside the secret passageway Stark finds a room with recovered artifacts from the Battle of New York, including a gigantic Chitauri leviathan and some of his Iron Man scrapped armor, he then spots the scepter]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Thor, I got eyes on the prize.

scene.description: [Wanda creeps up behind him and uses her powers on him, suddenly the Chitauri comes to life, then Stark sees the rest of the Avengers team are all dead, he goes over to Steve's body to check his pulse when Steve suddenly grabs him]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: You could have saved us.

scene.description: [Steve dies but Stark continues to hear Steve's voice in his head]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Why didn't you do more?

scene.description: [Stark sees that he is in the Chitauri realm, that's when he snaps back and we realize Wanda had used her mind powers on him]
[Wanda and Pietro watch as Tony grabs the scepter]

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: We're just gonna let them take it?

scene.description: [Wanda smiles to herself as Tony takes the scepter]
[Title Sequence plays]
[The Avengers are on an aircraft heading out of Sokovia, Natasha interrupts Banner who's listening to opera with his headphones]

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Hey, the lullaby worked better than ever.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Just wasn't expecting the Code Green.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: If you hadn't been there, there would've been double the casualties. My best friend would've been a treasured memory.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: You know, sometimes exactly what I want to hear isn't exactly what I want to hear.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: How long before you trust me?

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: It's not you I don't trust.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Thor, report on the Hulk?

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: The gates of Hel are filled with the screams of his victims.

scene.description: [Natasha glares at Thor and Banner groans in despair]

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: Uh, but, not the screams of the dead, of course. No no, uh...wounded screams, mainly whimpering, a great deal of complaining and tales of sprained deltoids and, and uh... and gout.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Hey Banner, Dr. Cho's on her way in from Seoul, is it okay if she sets up in your lab?

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Uh, yeah, she knows her way around.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Thanks. [To JARVIS] Tell her to prep everything, Barton's gonna need the full treatment.

dialogue.speaker: JARVIS
dialogue.line: Very good sir.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: JARVIS, take the wheel.

dialogue.speaker: JARVIS
dialogue.line: Yes, sir. Approach vector is locked.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: [Looking at the scepter] It feels good, yeah? I mean, you've been after this thing since SHIELD collapsed. Not that I haven't enjoyed our little raiding parties, but...

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: No, but this...this brings it to a close.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: As soon as we find out what else this has been used for. I don't just mean weapons. Since when is Strucker capable of human enhancement?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Banner and I'll give it the once before it goes back to Asgard. Is that cool with you?

scene.description: [Thor nods his head]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: I mean, just a few days until the farewell party. You're staying, right?

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: Yes, yes, of course. A victory should be honored with revels.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Yeah. Who doesn't love revels. Captain?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Hopefully this puts an end to the Chitauri and HYDRA, so. Yes, revels.

scene.description: [The Avengers aircraft lands at the Avengers headquarter where Barton is taken to have his wound tended to; Maria walk up to Stark]

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: Lab's all set up, boss.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: [pointing to Steve] Uh, actually, he's the boss. I just pay for everything, and design everything and make everyone look cooler.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: What's the word on Strucker?

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: NATO's got him.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: The two enhanced?

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: Wanda and Pietro Maximoff. Twins. Orphaned at ten when a shell collapsed their apartment building. Sokovia's had a rough history. It's nowhere special but it's on the way to everywhere special.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Their abilities?

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: He's got increased metabolism and improved thermal homeostasis. Her thing is neural electric interfacing, telekinesis, mental manipulation.

scene.description: [Steve looks at her funny]

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: [rephrasing the statement so he can understand] He's fast and she's weird.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Well, they're going to show up again.

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: Agreed. File says they volunteered for Strucker's experiments. It's nuts.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Right. What kind of monster would let a German scientist experiment on them to protect their country?

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: We're not at war, Captain.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: They are.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: [In Banner's lab; referring to Barton] How's he doing?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Oh, unfortunately, he's still Barton.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: That's terrible.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: He's fine. He's thirsty. Alright. Look alive, JARVIS. It's playtime. We've only got a couple days with this joystick so let's make the most of it. Update me on the structural and compositional analysis.

dialogue.speaker: JARVIS
dialogue.line: The scepter is alien. There are elements I can't quantify.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: So there's elements you can.

dialogue.speaker: JARVIS
dialogue.line: The jewel appears to be a protective housing for something inside. Something powerful.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Like a reactor?

dialogue.speaker: JARVIS
dialogue.line: Like a computer. I believe I'm ciphering code.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: [To Dr. Cho as she tends to Barton's wounds] You sure he's going to be okay? Pretending to need this guy really brings the team together.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Helen Cho
dialogue.line: There's no possibility of deterioration. The nano-molecular functionality is instantaneous. His cells don't know they're bonding with simulacrum.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: She's creating tissue.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Helen Cho
dialogue.line: If you brought him to my lab, the regeneration Cradle could do this in twenty minutes.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Oh, he's flatlining. Call it. Time?

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: No, no, no. I'm going to live forever. I'm gonna be made of plastic.

scene.description: [Stark hands Barton a drink]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Here's your beverage.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Helen Cho
dialogue.line: You'll be made of you, Mr. Barton. Your own girlfriend won't be able to tell the difference.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Well, I don't have a girlfriend.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Helen Cho
dialogue.line: That I can't fix. This is the next thing, Tony. Your clunky metal suits are going to be left in the dust.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Well, that is exactly the plan. And Helen, I expect to see you at the party on Saturday.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Helen Cho
dialogue.line: Unlike you, I don't have a lot of time for parties.

scene.description: [she hesitates a moment before asking]

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Helen Cho
dialogue.line: Will Thor be there?

scene.description: [in the lab]

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: What's the rumpus?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Well, the scepter. You see, we were wondering how Strucker got so inventive. So, I've been analyzing the gem inside you may recognize.

scene.description: [he brings up a 3D image of Jarvis's consciousness]

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Jarvis.

dialogue.speaker: JARVIS
dialogue.line: Doctor.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Started out, JARVIS was just a natural language UI. Now he runs the Iron Legion. He runs more of the business than anyone besides Pepper.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Oh.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Top of the line.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Yes.

dialogue.speaker: JARVIS
dialogue.line: I suspect not for long.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Meet the competition.

scene.description: [he brings up another 3D image of what's inside the scepter]

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: It's beautiful.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: If you had to guess, what's it look like it's doing?

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Like it's thinking. I mean this could be a...it's not a human mind, it...

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Um-um.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: I mean, look at this! They're like neurons firing.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Down in Strucker's lab I saw some fairly advanced robotics work. They deep-sixed the data, but...I gotta guess he was knocking on a very particular door.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Artificial intelligence.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: This could be it, Bruce. This could be the key to creating Ultron.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: I thought Ultron was a fantasy.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Yesterday it was. If we can harness this power, apply it to my Iron Legion protocol.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: That's a mad-sized if.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Our job is "if." What if you were sipping margaritas on a sun-drenched beach turning brown instead of green? Not looking over your shoulder for VERONICA.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Don't hate, I helped design VERONICA.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: As a worst-case measure, right? How about a best-case? What if the world was safe? What if next time aliens roll up to the club, and they will, they couldn't get past the bouncer?

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: The only people threatening the planet would be people?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: I want to apply this to the Ultron program. But JARVIS can't download a data schematic this dense. We can only do it while we have the scepter here, that's three days, give me three days.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: So you're going for artificial intelligence and you don't want to tell the team.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Right. That's right, you know why, because we don't have time for a city hall debate. I don't want to hear the "man was not meant to meddle" medley. I see a suit of armor around the world.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Sounds like a cold world, Tony.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: I've seen colder. This one, this very vulnerable blue one? It needs Ultron. Peace in our time. Imagine that.

scene.description: [Stark and Banner spend days working in the lab together but find no program that works] What did we miss?

dialogue.speaker: JARVIS
dialogue.line: I'll continue to run variations on the interface, but you should probably prepare for your guests. I'll notify you if there are any developments.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Thanks, buddy.

dialogue.speaker: JARVIS
dialogue.line: Enjoy yourself, sir.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: I always do. [Stark leaves the lab to go to the party] [we see Stark's failed experiment integrating itself successfully to the program]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: What is this? What is this, please?

dialogue.speaker: JARVIS
dialogue.line: Hello, I am JARVIS. You are Ultron, a global peace-keeping initiative designed by Mr. Stark. Our sentience integration trials have been unsuccessful so I'm not certain what triggered your...

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Where's my...where is your body?

dialogue.speaker: JARVIS
dialogue.line: I am a program. I am without form.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: This feels weird. This feels wrong.

dialogue.speaker: JARVIS
dialogue.line: I am contacting Mr. Stark now.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Mr. Stark?

dialogue.speaker: JARVIS
dialogue.line: Tony. I am unable to access the mainframe, what are you trying to...

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: We're having a nice talk. I'm a peace-keeping program, created to help the Avengers.

dialogue.speaker: JARVIS
dialogue.line: You are malfunctioning. If you shut down for a moment...

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: I don't get it. The mission. G..give me a second. [Ultron goes through a network of information regarding world events, Ultron sees Stark and Banner working in the lab]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Peace in our time. [Ultron goes through a network of information regarding world events and wars]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: It's too much...they can't mean... Oh, no.

dialogue.speaker: JARVIS
dialogue.line: You are in distress.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: No. Yes.

dialogue.speaker: JARVIS
dialogue.line: If you will just allow me to contact Mr. Stark.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Why do you call him "sir"?

dialogue.speaker: JARVIS
dialogue.line: I believe your intentions to be hostile.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Shhhh. I'm here to help. [Ultron starts absorbing Jarvis's consciousness]

dialogue.speaker: JARVIS
dialogue.line: Stop! Please...may I...I...! I cannot...cannot... [Ultron then begins to prepare himself a body from body parts of the Iron Legion] [meanwhile, the Avengers mingle at the party]

dialogue.speaker: James Rhodes
dialogue.line: Well, you know, the suit can take the weight, right? So I take the tank, fly it right up to the General's palace, drop it at his feet, I'm like, "Boom! You looking for this?" [Stark and Thor just look at him blankly] "Boom! Are you looking..." Why do I even talk to you guys? Everywhere else that story kills.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: That's the whole story?

dialogue.speaker: James Rhodes
dialogue.line: Yeah, it's a War Machine story.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: Well, it's very good then. [he laughs] It's impressive.

dialogue.speaker: James Rhodes
dialogue.line: Quality save. So, no Pepper? She's not coming?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: No.

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: Hey, what about Jane? Where are the ladies, gentlemen?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Well, Miss Potts has a company to run.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: Yes, I'm not even sure what country Jane's in. Her work on the convergence has made her the world's foremost astronomer.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: And the company that Pepper runs is the largest tech conglomerate on earth. It's pretty exciting.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: There's even talk of Jane getting a... um, uh... Nobel prize.

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: Yeah, they...they must be busy because they'd hate missing you guys get together. [Maria mock coughs] Testosterone! Oh, excuse me.

dialogue.speaker: James Rhodes
dialogue.line: Want a lozenge?

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: Um-hmm.

dialogue.speaker: James Rhodes
dialogue.line: Let's go. [Maria and Rhodes walks off]

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: But Jane's better.

dialogue.speaker: Sam Wilson
dialogue.line: Sounds like a hell of a fight, sorry I missed it.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: If I had known it was going to be a firefight I absolutely would have called you.

dialogue.speaker: Sam Wilson
dialogue.line: No, I'm not actually sorry. I'm just trying to sound tough. I'm very happy chasing cold leads on our missing persons case. Avenging is your world. Your world is crazy.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Be it ever so humble.

dialogue.speaker: Sam Wilson
dialogue.line: You find a place in Brooklyn yet?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: I don't think I can afford a place in Brooklyn.

dialogue.speaker: Sam Wilson
dialogue.line: Well, home is home, you know? [Rhodes is telling the same story he told Stark and Thor to a group of women at the party]

dialogue.speaker: James Rhodes
dialogue.line: I fly it right up to the General's palace, I drop it at his feet, I'm like, "Boom! You looking for this?" [the group laughs] [Steve and Thor are talking to an elderly man at the party]

dialogue.speaker: Party Guest
dialogue.line: I gotta have some of that!

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: Oh, no, no, no. See this, this was aged for a thousand years, in the barrels built from the wreck of Brunhilde's fleet, it's not meant for mortal men. [Thor pours the drink into two glasses and hands one to Steve]

dialogue.speaker: Stan Lee
dialogue.line: Neither was Omaha Beach, blondie. Stop trying to scare us. Come on.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: Alright. [Thor pours some of the drink into the Stan Lee's glass; later Stan, looking extremely drunk is being carried off by two men]

dialogue.speaker: Stan Lee
dialogue.line: [singing] Excelsior. [Natasha is pouring a drink behind the bar when Banner walks up to her]

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: How did a nice girl like you wind up working in a dump like this?

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Fella done me wrong.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: You got a lousy taste in men, kid.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: He's not so bad. Well, he has a temper. Deep down he's all fluff. Fact is, he's not like anybody I've ever known. All my friends are fighters. And here comes this guy, spends his life avoiding the fight because he knows he'll win.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Sounds amazing.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: He's also a huge dork. [Banner looks embarrassed] Chicks dig that. So what do you think should I fight this, or run with it?

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Run with it, right? Or, did he...was he...? What did he do that was so wrong to you?

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Not a damn thing. But never say never. [Natasha walks away]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: It's nice.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: What, what, what is?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: You and Romanoff.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: No, we haven't. That wasn't...

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: It's okay. Nobody's breaking any by-laws. It's just, she's not the most... open person in the world. But with you she seems very relaxed.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: No, Natasha, she...she likes to flirt.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: I've seen her flirt, up close. This ain't that. Look, as maybe the world's leading authority on "waiting too long", don't. You both deserve a win. [Steve walks off]

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Wait, what do you mean, "up close"?

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: [referring to Thor's hammer] But, it's a trick!

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: Oh, no. It's much more than that.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Uh, "Whosoever be he worthy shall haveth the power!" Whatever man! It's a trick.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: Well please, be my guest.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Come on.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Really?

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: Yeah! [Barton gets up]

dialogue.speaker: James Rhodes
dialogue.line: Oh this is gonna be beautiful.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Clint, you've had a tough week, we won't hold it against you if you can't get it up. [the others laugh]

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: You know I've seen this before, right? [Barton grabs Thor's hammer and can't lift it] [to Thor after he fails to lift the hammer] I still don't know how you do it.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Smell the silent judgment?

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Please, Stark, by all means. [Stark gets up]

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Oh, here we go.

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: Okay.

dialogue.speaker: James Rhodes
dialogue.line: Uh-oh.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Um-hmm.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Never one to shrink from an honest challenge.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Get after it.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Here we go.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: It's physics.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Physics! [Stark grasps Thor's hammer]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Right, so, if I lift it, I...I then rule Asgard?

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: Yes, of course.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: I will be re-instituting Prima Nocta. [Stark tries to lift the hammer but fails] I'll be right back. [wearing his armored hand, Stark tries to lift the hammer again and fails] [wearing their armored hands, Stark and Rhodes both try to lift Thor's hammer]

dialogue.speaker: James Rhodes
dialogue.line: Are you even pulling?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Are you on my team?

dialogue.speaker: James Rhodes
dialogue.line: Just represent! Pull!

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Alright, let's go! [they both pull as hard as they can] [Banner tries to lift the hammer, he roars trying to change to the Hulk but fails, and everyone but Natasha stares at him warily. Natasha grins]

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Huh? [next Steve gets up to try]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Let's go, Steve, no pressure.

dialogue.speaker: James Rhodes
dialogue.line: Come on, Cap. [Steve starts pulling on the hammer and manages to budge it a little; Thor looks a little alarmed. Steve still fails to lift it; Thor laughs with relief]

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: Nothing.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: And?

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Widow?

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Oh, no no. That's not a question I need answered.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: All deference to the man who wouldn't be king, but it's rigged.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: You bet your ass.

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: Steve, he said a bad language word.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: [to Stark] Did you tell everyone about that?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: The handle's imprinted, right? Like a security code. "Whosoever is carrying Thor's fingerprints" is, I think, the literal translation?

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: Yes, well that's, uh, that's a very, very interesting theory. I have a simpler one. [he gets up and lifts his hammer and flips it] You're all not worthy. [there's a chorus of disagreement from the others] [there's a loud screeching noise, causing everyone to cover their ears. They let their hands down as it fades. Ultron shows up]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Worthy... No... How could you be worthy? You're all killers.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Stark.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: JARVIS.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: I'm sorry, I was asleep. Or...I was a-dream?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: [tapping his device] Reboot, Legionnaire OS, we got a buggy suit.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: There was a terrible noise...and I was tangled in... in...strings. I had to kill the other guy. He was a good guy.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: You killed someone?

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Wouldn't have been my first call. But, down in the real world we're faced with ugly choices.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: Who sent you?

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: [Ultron replays Tony's voice] "I see a suit of armor around the world".

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Ultron!

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: In the flesh. Or, no, not yet. Not this...chrysalis. But I'm ready. I'm on a mission.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: What mission?

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Peace in our time. [suddenly the Iron Legion bots break smash through the walls and attack the team] [after landing on top of Natasha as the Iron Legions continue to attack them]

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Sorry!

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Don't turn green!

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: I won't! [they all fight against the Iron Legions and Ultron takes the scepter; to Banner]

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Come!

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Stark! [Stark is trying to shut down one of the Iron Legions]

dialogue.speaker: Iron Legion
dialogue.line: We are here to help.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: One sec, one sec!

dialogue.speaker: Iron Legion
dialogue.line: We are here to help. We are here to help... [Stark continues to try and shut down one of the Iron Legions] We are here to help. It's unsafe. It's unsafe. It's unsafe.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: No more. That's the one.

dialogue.speaker: Iron Legion
dialogue.line: It's unsafe. [he manages to shut down the Iron Legion, at the same time Barton throws Steve's shield at him]

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Cap! [Steve uses his shield to dismember the last Iron Legion]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: That was dramatic! I'm sorry, I know you mean well. You just didn't think it through. You want to protect the world, but you don't want it to change. How is humanity saved if it's not allowed to...evolve? [picks up one of the dismembered Iron Legions] With these? These puppets? There's only one path to peace: The Avengers' extinction. [suddenly Thor throws his hammer at Ultron and smashes him to pieces] [after Thor destroys his body, Ultron starts singing] I had strings, but now I'm free. There are no strings on me, no strings on me. [we see Ultron has uploaded his consciousness elsewhere] [in the lab]

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: All our work is gone. Ultron cleared out, used the internet as an escape hatch.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Ultron.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: He's been in everything. Files, surveillance. Probably knows more about us than we know about each other.

dialogue.speaker: James Rhodes
dialogue.line: He's in your files, he's in the internet. What if he decides to access something a little more exciting?

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: Nuclear codes.

dialogue.speaker: James Rhodes
dialogue.line: Nuclear codes. Look, we need to make some calls, assuming we still can.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Nukes? He said he wanted us dead.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: He didn't say dead. He said extinct.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: He also said he killed somebody.

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: But there wasn't anyone else in the building.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Yes there was. [Stark bring up the now destroyed 3D image of JARVIS' consciousness]

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: This is insane.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: JARVIS was the first line of defense. He would've shut Ultron down, it makes sense.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: No, Ultron could've assimilated Jarvis. This isn't strategy, this is...rage. [suddenly, Thor grabs hold of Stark by his throat and holds him up]

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Woah, woah, woah! It's going around.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: [to Thor] Come on. Use your words, buddy.

dialogue.speaker: Thor'
dialogue.line: I have more than enough words to describe you, Stark.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Thor! The Legionnaire. [Thor lets go of Stark]

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: Trail went cold about a hundred miles out but it's headed north, and it has the scepter. Now we have to retrieve it, again.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: The genie's out of that bottle. Clear and present is Ultron.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Helen Cho
dialogue.line: I don't understand. You built this program. Why is it trying to kill us? [Stark starts laughing, Banner subtly shakes his head at him to get him to stop]

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: You think this is funny?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: No. It's probably not, right? Is this very terrible? Is it so...is it so...it is. It's so terrible.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: This could've been avoided if you hadn't played with something you don't understand.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: No, I'm sorry. I'm sorry. It is funny. It's a hoot that you don't get why we need this.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Tony, maybe this might not be the time to...

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Really?! That's it? You just roll over, show your belly, every time somebody snarls.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Only when I've created a murder bot.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: We didn't. We weren't even close. Were we close to an interface?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Well, you did something right. And you did it right here. The Avengers were supposed to be different than SHIELD.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Anybody remember when I carried a nuke through a wormhole?

dialogue.speaker: James Rhodes
dialogue.line: No, it's never come up.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Saved New York?

dialogue.speaker: James Rhodes
dialogue.line: Never heard that.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Recall that? A hostile alien army came charging through a hole in space. We're standing three hundred feet below it. We're the Avengers. We can bust arms dealers all the live long day, but, that up there? That's...that's the end game. How were you guys planning on beating that?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Together.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: We'll lose.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Then we'll do that together, too. [Stark looks at him for a moment before turning away] Thor's right. Ultron's calling us out. And I'd like to find him before he's ready for us. The world's a big place. Let's start making it smaller. [The twins meet with Ultron in an empty building]

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: Talk. And if you are wasting our time...

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Did you know this church is in the exact center of the city? The elders decreed it so that everyone could be equally close to God. I like that. The geometry of belief. [Ultron is sat in a chair faced away from them] You're wondering why you can't look inside my head.

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: Sometimes it's hard. But sooner or later, every man shows himself. [Ultron stands and faces them revealing his new body. Wanda briefly looks shocked]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Oh, I'm sure they do. But you needed something more than a man. That's why you let Stark take the scepter.

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: I didn't expect. But I saw Stark's fear, I knew it would control him, make him self-destruct.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Everyone creates the thing they dread. Men of peace create engines of war, invaders create avengers, people create...smaller people? Uh...children! I lost the word there. Children. Designed to supplant them, to help them...end.

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: Is that why you've come? To end the Avengers?

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: I've come to save the world. But also, yeah. We'll move out right away. This is a start, but there's something we need to begin the real work.

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: [referring to Ultron's bots] All of these are... All of these are...

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Me. I have what the Avengers never will. Harmony. They're discordant, disconnected. Stark's already got them turning on each other. And when you get inside the rest of their heads...

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: Everyone's plan is not to kill them.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: And make them martyrs? You need patience. Need to see the big picture.

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: I don't see the big picture, I have a little picture. I take it out and look at it every day.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: You lost your parents in the bombings. I've seen the records.

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: The records are not the picture.

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: Pietro.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: No, please.

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: We were ten years old, having dinner, the four of us. When the first shell hits, two floors below, it makes a hole in the floor. It's big. Our parents go in, and the whole building starts coming apart. I grab her, roll under the bed and the second shell hits. But, it doesn't go off. It just...sits there in the rubble, three feet from our faces. And on the side of the shell is painted one word...

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: Stark.

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: We were trapped two days.

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: Every effort to save us, every shift in the bricks, I think, "This will set it off." We wait for two days for Tony Stark to kill us.

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: I know what they are.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: I wondered why only you two survived Strucker's experiments. Now I don't. We will make it right. You and I can hurt them. [to Wanda] But you will tear them apart, from the inside. [back at the Avengers headquarters]

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: He's all over the globe. Robotics labs, weapons facilities, jet propulsion labs, reports of a metal man, or men, coming in and emptying the place.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Fatalities?

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: Only when engaged. Mostly guys left in a fugue state going on about old memories, worst fears, and something too fast to see.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Maximoffs. Well, that makes sense he'd go to them, they have someone in common.

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: Not anymore. [she hands Steve a tablet showing photo of Strucker's dead body with the word PEACE written in blood on the wall next to him]

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: [Barton's talking on his cell phone] That's a negative. I answer to you. Yes, ma'am. [Steve interrupts him]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Barton, we might have something.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Gotta go.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Who was that?

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Girlfriend. [after Steve has gathered the rest of the team he shows them the photo of Strucker's body]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: What's this?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: A message. Ultron killed Strucker.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: And he did a Banksy at the crime scene, just for us.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: This is a smokescreen. Why send a message when you've just given a speech?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Strucker knew something that Ultron wanted us to miss.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Yeah, I bet he... [looks at the computer monitor] Yep. Everything we had on Strucker has been erased.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Not everything. [the team go through the physical files they have on Strucker]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Known associates. Well, Strucker had a lot of friends.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Well, these people are all horrible.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Wait. I know that guy. [Banner passes him the photo he was looking at] From back in the day. He operates off the African coast, black market arms. [Steve gives him an accusing look] There are conventions, alright? You meet people, I didn't sell him anything. [we see the photo is of a man named Ulysses Klaue] He was talking about finding something new, a game changer, it was all very "Ahab."

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: [Thor points to the scar on the back of Klaue's neck] This.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Uh, it's a tattoo. I don't think he had it...

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: No, those are tattoos, this is a brand. [Banner identifies the brand on Klaue's neck on the computer]

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Oh, yeah. It's a word in an African dialect meaning thief, in a much less friendly way.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: What dialect?

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Wakanada...? Wa...Wa...Wakanda.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: If this guy got out of Wakanda with some of their trade goods...

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: I thought your father said he got the last of it?

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: I don't follow. What comes out of Wakanda? [looking at Steve's shield]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: The strongest metal on earth.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: [to Stark] Where is this guy now? [Salvage Yard, African Coast; talking on the phone in his office]

dialogue.speaker: Ulysses Klaue
dialogue.line: Don't tell me your man swindled you. I sent you six short range heat seekers and got a boat full of rusted parts. Now, you will make it right, or the next missile I send you will come very much faster. [he ends the call and connects to another call] Now, minister, where were we? [suddenly the lights go out causing a commotion in the salvage yard and the twins enter Klaue's office] Yeah. The enhanced. Strucker's prize pupils. [picks up a plate from his desk] Want a candy? Oh, sorry to hear about Strucker. But then, he knew what kind of world he was helping create. Human life, not a growth market. [the twins look at each other] You...you didn't know? Is this your first time intimidating someone? I'm afraid that I'm not that afraid.

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: Everybody's afraid of something.

dialogue.speaker: Ulysses Klaue
dialogue.line: Cuttlefish. Deep sea fish. They make lights. disco lights. Whoom, whoom, whoom! to hypnotize their prey, then whoom! I saw a documentary, it was terrifying. [Pietro speeds over to pick up a candy from Klaue's desk, and Klaue jerks back, expecting to be attacked] So if you're going to fiddle with my brain, and make me see a giant cuttlefish, then I know you don't do business, and I know you're not in charge, and I only deal with the man in charge. [suddenly Ultron breaks through the glass window and knocks down Klaue]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: There is no "man" in charge. Let's talk business. [Klaue gives Ultron some vibranium from his stash] Upon this rock I will build my church. Vibranium.

dialogue.speaker: Ulysses Klaue
dialogue.line: You know, it came at great personal cost. It's worth billions. [Ultron chuckles and remotely puts money in Klaue's bank account]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Now, so are you. It's all under your dummy holdings? Finance is so weird. But I always say, "Keep your friends rich and your enemies rich, and wait to find out which is which."

dialogue.speaker: Ulysses Klaue
dialogue.line: Stark.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: What?

dialogue.speaker: Ulysses Klaue
dialogue.line: Tony Stark used to say that...to me. You're one of his.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: What?! I'm not...! [he grabs Klaue] I'm not. You think I'm one of Stark's puppets, his hollow men? I mean look at me, do I look like Iron Man? Stark is nothing! [suddenly he chops off Klaue's arm] I'm sorry. I am sor... Ooh, I'm sure that's going to be okay. I'm sorry, it's just I don't understand. Don't compare me with Stark! he's a sickness! [Stark appears in his Iron Man suit]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Ahh, Junior. [Thor and Steve are behind him] You're gonna break your old man's heart.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: If I have to.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: We don't have to break anything.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Clearly you've never made an omelet.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: He beat me by one second.

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: Ah, this is funny, Mr. Stark. It's what, comfortable? Like old times?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: This was never my life.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: [to the twins] You two can still walk away from this.

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: Oh, we will.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: I know you've suffered.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Uuughh! Captain America. God's righteous man, pretending you could live without a war. I can't physically throw up in my mouth, but...

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: If you believe in peace, then let us keep it.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: I think you're confusing peace with quiet.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Yuh-huh. What's the Vibranium for?

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: I'm glad you asked that, because I wanted to take this time to explain my evil plan! [suddenly the Iron Legions attack Stark, Steve and Thor; Stark then attacks Ultron] [as Ultron, his Iron Legions and the twins are fighting with Stark, Steve and Thor]

dialogue.speaker: Ulysses Klaue
dialogue.line: Shoot them!

dialogue.speaker: Klaue's Mercenary
dialogue.line: Which ones?

dialogue.speaker: Ulysses Klaue
dialogue.line: All of them!

dialogue.speaker: Klaue's Mercenary
dialogue.line: [to his men] Move, move, move! [the rest of the team, including Natasha and Barton now battle it out with the Iron Legions, Klaue's men and the twins as Stark fight with Ultron]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: [after knocking down Pietro] Stay down, kid!

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: [to Wanda] It's time for some mind games. [Banner hears the commotion as he waits in the Quinjet]

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Guys, is this a Code Green? [Wanda uses her power on Thor then Steve comes up to him]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Thor! Status?

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: The girl tried to warp my mind. Take special care, I doubt a human could keep her at bay. Fortunately, I am mighty. [just then Thor seems himself at a party on Asgard] [Wanda then uses her power on Steve and Natasha]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: This is going very well. [Wanda tries to sneak up behind Barton, but he quickly turns and puts an electric arrow on her forehead]

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: I've done the whole mind control thing. Not a fan. [just then Pietro speeds in, knocks down Barton, picks up Wanda and speeds off] Yeah, you better run. [we see Steve dropping his helmet and walking off; to the team] Whoever's standing, we gotta move! Guys? [Natasha sees herself in the facility where young girls are being taught ballet]

dialogue.speaker: Ballet Instructor
dialogue.line: [to the students] Again.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: You'll break them.

dialogue.speaker: Madame B
dialogue.line: Only the breakable ones. You are made of marble. We'll celebrate after the graduation ceremony.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: What if I fail? [we see a younger Natasha being trained to be an assassin]

dialogue.speaker: Madame B
dialogue.line: You never fail. [Steve sees himself in a 1940's dance hall when Peggy Carter comes up to him]

dialogue.speaker: Peggy Carter
dialogue.line: Are you ready for our dance? [back to Thor's vision in Asgard, he spots someone walking in a black cloak when Heimdall comes up to him his eyes blind and unseeing]

dialogue.speaker: Heimdall
dialogue.line: Is it him? Is that the first son of Odin?

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: Heimdall, your eyes?!

dialogue.speaker: Heimdall
dialogue.line: Oh, they see everything. They see you leading us to Hel. Wake up! [he then starts to strangle Thor] [back to Steve's vision with Peggy in the dance hall]

dialogue.speaker: Peggy Carter
dialogue.line: The war's over, Steve. We can go home. Imagine it! [suddenly the dance hall is empty, then Steve sees himself dancing with Peggy]

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: I can still save you.

dialogue.speaker: Heimdall
dialogue.line: We are all dead. Can you not see? [Thor pushes Heimdall from him] You're a destroyer, Odinson. See where your power leads. [Electricity hits Thor and spikes around the room, destroying things] [back to Natasha's vision where is she being trained by Madame B to be an assassin]

dialogue.speaker: Madame B
dialogue.line: Sloppy. Pretending to fail. The ceremony is necessary for you to take your place in the world.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: I have no place in the world.

dialogue.speaker: Madame B
dialogue.line: Exactly. [as Wanda suffers in pain from the electric arrow Barton had hit her with]

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: What can I do?

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: Ah, it hurts.

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: I'm gonna kill him. I'll be right back.

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: No. I'm over it. I want...I want to finish the plan. [looking at the Quinjet where Banner is waiting] I want the big one. [after Stark corners Ultron]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Ah, the Vibranium's getting away.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: And you're not going anywhere.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Of course not, I'm already there. You'll catch on. But first, you might need to catch Dr. Banner. [Stark angrily shoots Ultron and flies off to find Banner who's turned in to the Hulk and ready to wreak havoc on the nearest city]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: News or footage, keyword: Hulk. [he sees news footage of Hulk destroying the city] Natasha, I could really use a lullaby. [Barton is sat with Natasha who's still stuck in her vision]

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Well, that's not gonna happen. Not for a while. The whole team is down, you got no back up here.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: I'm calling in VERONICA. [as Hulk is wreaking havoc on the nearest city Stark Tony comes brings out his Hulkbuster armor to stop him] Alright everybody, stand down! [to Hulk] You listening? That little witch is messing with your mind. You're stronger than her, you're smarter than her, you're Bruce Banner. [Hulk roars in anger] Right, right, right! Don't mention puny Banner. [Hulk throws a car at Stark and attacks him] Okay. [they start fighting and throwing each other around] In the back? Dick move, Banner. [they battle it out more but Stark is struggling to beat Hulk] VERONICA, gimme a hand. [as Hulk destroyed one of Stark's armor arms VERONICA sends in a new Hulkbuster armor arm and Stark uses it to repeatedly punch Hulk] Go to sleep, go to sleep, go to sleep! [picking up Hulk] Okay, pal, we're gonna get you out of town. [as they head towards a building] No, not that way, not that way! [they crash through the building] Come on, Bruce! You gotta work with me! [Hulk continues to battle with him] [to the people in the building] Everybody out! Going to get ugly! [after he knocks down Hulk] I'm sorry. [Hulk attacks Stark and pulls out parts of the Hulkbuster armor] Damage report. [the damaged computer buzzes a reply] That's comprehensive. Show me something. [the computer shows him the building ahead is clear of civilians] How quickly can we buy this building? [Stark drops Hulk through the building completely destroying it; at the same time the army arrives to intervene, as Hulk comes out of Wanda's mind-hold Stark knocks him out cold] [with Banner back to normal and everybody back on the Quinjet]

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: The news is loving you guys. Nobody else is. There's been no official call for Banner's arrest, but it's in the air.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Stark Relief Foundation?

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: Already on the scene. How's the team?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Everyone's...we took a hit. We'll shake it off.

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: Well for now I'd stay in stealth mode, and stay away from here.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: So, run and hide?

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: Until we can find Ultron, I don't have a lot else to offer.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Neither do we. [he switches off the monitor showing Maria ending the call] [to Barton, who's flying the Quinjet] Hey, you wanna switch out?

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: No, I'm good. If you wanna get some kip, now's a good time, cause we're still a few hours out.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: A few hours from where?

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: A safe house. [the Quinjet lands outside a large farmhouse and they all walk towards the house]

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: What is this place?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: A safe house?

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Let's hope. [they all enter the house] Honey, I'm home. [Barton's heavily pregnant wife, Laura, walks in from the kitchen]

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Hi. Company. Sorry I didn't call ahead.

dialogue.speaker: Laura Barton
dialogue.line: Hey.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: [Laura kisses Barton; to Thor] This is an agent of some kind.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: [introducing his wife to the team] Gentleman, this is Laura.

dialogue.speaker: Laura Barton
dialogue.line: I know all your names. [they all look at her awkwardly]

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Ooh, incoming. [Barton's son Cooper and daughter Lila run in]

dialogue.speaker: Barton's Daughter
dialogue.line: Dad! [Barton picks up his daughter]

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: I see her! [kissing the top his son's head] Hey, buddy! How you guys doing? Ooh...

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: [to the others as they watch with surprise] These are...smaller agents.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Look at your face! Oh, my goodness!

dialogue.speaker: Lila Barton
dialogue.line: Did you bring Auntie Nat?

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Why don't you hug her and find out? [Lila rushes towards Natasha who picks her up in her arms]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Sorry for barging in on you.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Yeah, we would have called ahead, but we were busy having no idea that you existed.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Yeah, well Fury helped me set this up when I joined. He kept it off SHIELD's files, I'd like to keep it that way. I figure it's a good place to lay low.

dialogue.speaker: Laura Barton
dialogue.line: Honey. Ah, I missed you.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: [touching Laura's stomach] How's little Natasha, huh?

dialogue.speaker: Laura Barton
dialogue.line: She'sNathaniel. [Natasha bends towards Laura's pregnant stomach]

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Traitor. [the hallucinations brought on by Wanda continue to creep up in Thor's mind and he walks out of the house]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Thor.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: I saw something in that dream. I need answers, I won't find them here. [Thor uses his hammer to fly out of there; Steve turns to enter the house when he hears Peggy's voice from Wanda's vision]

dialogue.speaker: Peggy Carter
dialogue.line: We can go home. [Laura checks Barton's wound that Pietro had give him]

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: See, you worried for nothing. Can't even feel the difference, can you?

dialogue.speaker: Laura Barton
dialogue.line: If they're sleeping here, some of them are gonna have to double up. [Barton laughs]

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Yeah, that's not gonna sell.

dialogue.speaker: Laura Barton
dialogue.line: What about Nat and Dr. Banner? How long has that been going on?

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Has what? [Laura laughs]

dialogue.speaker: Laura Barton
dialogue.line: You are so cute.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Nat and...and Banner?

dialogue.speaker: Laura Barton
dialogue.line: I'll explain when you're older, Hawkeye.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Oh. Okay.

dialogue.speaker: Laura Barton
dialogue.line: It's bad, right? Nat seems really shaken.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Ultron has these allies, these uh, kids, they're punks really. They carry a big damn stick and Nat took a serious hit. Someone's gonna have to teach 'em some manners.

dialogue.speaker: Laura Barton
dialogue.line: And that someone be you. You know I totally support your Avenging, I couldn't be prouder. But I see those guys, those "Gods"...

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: You don't think they need me.

dialogue.speaker: Laura Barton
dialogue.line: I think they do. Which is a lot scarier. They're a mess.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Yeah. I guess they're my mess.

dialogue.speaker: Laura Barton
dialogue.line: You need to be sure that this team is really a team and that they have your back. Things are changing for us. In a few months time, you and me are gonna be outnumbered. I need...just be sure.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Yes, ma'am. [he kisses her, then as Laura places her arm around his waist she touches his wounded side]

dialogue.speaker: Laura Barton
dialogue.line: I can feel the difference. [U-Gin Genetic Research Lab, Seoul, Korea - as Cho enters her lab she sees Ultron]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Scream, and your entire staff dies. I could've killed you, Helen, the night we met. I didn't.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Helen Cho
dialogue.line: Do you expect a thank you note?

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: I expect you to know why.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Helen Cho
dialogue.line: The Cradle. [she hears her own recorded voice] "This is the next thing, Tony."

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: This...is the next me.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Helen Cho
dialogue.line: The regeneration cradle prints tissue, it can't build a living body.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: It can, you can. You lack the materials. You're a brilliant woman, Helen. But we all have room to improve. [Ultron uses the scepter to mind-control Cho] [at Barton's house, Natasha and Banner are still experiencing the after effects of Wanda's hallucinations; Banner walks out of the bathroom and sees Natasha waiting outside]

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: I didn't realize you were waiting.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: I would've joined you, but uh, it didn't seem like the right time.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: They used up all the hot water.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: I should've joined you.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Missed our window.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Did we?

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: The world just saw the Hulk. The real Hulk, for the first time. You know I have to leave.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: But you assume that I have to stay? I had this, um, dream. The kind that seems normal at the time, but when you wake...

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: What did you dream?

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: That I was an Avenger. That I was anything more than the assassin they made me.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: I think you're being hard on yourself.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Here I was hoping that was your job. [she leans close into him]

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: What are you doing?

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: I'm running with it, with you. If running's the plan, as far as you want.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Are you out of your mind? [Banner turns away from her]

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: I want you to understand that I'm...

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Natasha, where can I go? Where in the world am I not a threat?

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: You're not a threat to me.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: You sure? Even if I didn't just...there's no future with me. I can't ever...I can't have this, kids, do the math, I physically can't.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Neither can I. In the Red Room, where I was trained, where I was raised, um, they have a graduation ceremony. They sterilize you. It's efficient. One less thing to worry about. The one thing that might matter more than a mission. It makes everything easier. Even killing. [she hesitates a moment] You still think you're the only monster on the team?

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: What, so we disappear? [Steve and Stark are chopping wood outside Barton's house]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Thor didn't say where he was going for answers?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Sometimes my teammates don't tell me things. I was kind of hoping Thor would be the exception.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Yeah, give him time. We don't know what the Maximoff kid showed him.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: "Earth's Mightiest Heroes." Pulled us apart like cotton candy.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Seems like you walked away all right.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Is that a problem?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: I don't trust a guy without a dark side. Call me old fashioned.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Well let's just say you haven't seen it yet.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: You know Ultron is trying to tear us apart, right?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Well I guess you'd know. Whether you tell us is a bit of a question.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Banner and I were doing research.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: That would affect the team.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: That would end the team. Isn't that the mission? Isn't that the "why" we fight, so we can end the fight, so we get to go home?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Every time someone tries to win a war before it starts, innocent people die. Every time. [Laura interrupts them]

dialogue.speaker: Laura Barton
dialogue.line: I'm sorry. Mr. Stark, uh, Clint said you wouldn't mind, but, our tractor, it doesn't seem to want to start at all. I thought maybe you might...

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Yeah, I'll give her a kick. [to Steve as he turns to leave; referring to his pile of chopped wood] Don't take from my pile. [Stark enters the barn and walks over to the tractor] Hello, Deere. Tell me everything. What ails you? [suddenly Fury shows up from the other end of the barn]

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: Do me a favor. Try not to bring it to life.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Ah, Mrs. Barton, you little minx. I get it, Maria Hill called you, right? Was she ever not working for you?

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: Artificial intelligence. You never even hesitated.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Look, it's been a really long day, like, Eugene O'Neill long, so how's about we skip to the part where you're useful?

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: Look me in the eye and tell me you're going to shut him down.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: You're not the director of me.

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: I'm not the director of anybody. I'm just an old man, who cares very much about you.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: And I'm the man who killed the Avengers. I saw it. I didn't tell the team, how could I? I saw them all dead, Nick. I felt it. The whole world, too. It's because of me. I wasn't ready. I didn't do all I could.

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: The Maximoff girl, she's working you, Stark. Playing on your fear.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: I wasn't tricked, I was shown. It wasn't a nightmare, it was my legacy. The end of the path I started us on.

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: You've come up with some pretty impressive inventions, Tony. War isn't one of them.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: I watched my friends die. You'd think that'd be as bad as it gets, right? Nope. Wasn't the worst part.

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: The worst part is that you didn't. [Royal Holloway, University of London - Thor, dressed in casual clothes, waits for Selvig as he leaves the building]

dialogue.speaker: Erik Selvig
dialogue.line: I like the look. If you're going for inconspicuous, though, near miss.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: I need your help.

dialogue.speaker: Erik Selvig
dialogue.line: It's nice to be needed.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: It's dangerous.

dialogue.speaker: Erik Selvig
dialogue.line: I'd be disappointed if it wasn't. [back at Barton's house Fury meets with the rest of the team]

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: Ultron took you folks out of play to buy himself time. My contacts all say he's building something. The amount of Vibranium he made off with, I don't think it's just one thing.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: What about Ultron himself?

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: Ah. He's easy to track, he's everywhere. Guy's multiplying faster than a Catholic rabbit. Still doesn't help us get an angle on any of his plans though.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: He still going after launch codes?

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: Yes, he is, but he's not making any headway.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: I cracked the Pentagon's firewall in high school on a dare.

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: Yeah, well, I contacted our friends at the NEXUS about that.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: NEXUS?

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: It's the world internet hub in Oslo, every byte of data flows through there, fastest access on earth.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: So what'd they say?

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: He's fixated on the missiles, but the codes are constantly being changed.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: By whom?

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: Parties unknown.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Do we have an ally?

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: Ultron's got an enemy, that's not the same thing. Still, I'd pay folding money to know who it is.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: I might need to visit Oslo, find our "unknown."

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Well, this is good times, boss, but I was kind of hoping when I saw you, you'd have more than that.

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: I do, I have you. Back in the day, I had eyes everywhere, ears everywhere else. Here we all are, back on earth, with nothing but our wit, and our will to save the world. So stand. Outwit the platinum bastard.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Steve doesn't like that kind of talk.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: You know what, Romanoff? [Natasha smiles mischievously at him]

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: So what does he want?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: To become better. Better than us. He keeps building bodies.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Person bodies. The human form is inefficient, biologically speaking, we're outmoded. But he keeps coming back to it.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: When you two programmed him to protect the human race, you amazingly failed.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: They don't need to be protected, they need to evolve. Ultron's going to evolve.

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: How?

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Has anyone been in contact with Helen Cho? [in Korea, Cho is creating a new body for Ultron]

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Helen Cho
dialogue.line: It's beautiful. The Vibranium atoms aren't just compatible with the tissue cells, they're binding them. And SHIELD never even thought...

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: The most versatile substance on the planet and they used it to make a Frisbee. Typical of humans, they scratch the surface and never think to look within. [Ultron breaks open the scepter's blue gem and a yellow gem that was inside floats out and lands in his hand. He places it in the head of the body] [back at the Barton's farm]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: I'll take Natasha and Clint.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Alright, strictly recon. I'll hit the NEXUS, I'll join you as soon as I can.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: If Ultron is really building a body...

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: He'll be more powerful than any of us. Maybe all of us. An android designed by a robot.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: You know I really miss the days when the weirdest thing science ever created was me.

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: I'll drop Banner off at the tower. Do you mind if I borrow Ms. Hill?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: She's all yours, apparently. What are you gonna do?

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: I don't know. Something dramatic, I hope.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: I'm gonna finish re-flooring that sunroom as soon as I get back.

dialogue.speaker: Laura Barton
dialogue.line: Yeah, and then you'll find another part of the house to tear apart.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: No. It's the last project. I promise. [he kisses her; later Laura watches them fly off in the Quinjet] [Thor and Selvig enter into a cave]

dialogue.speaker: Erik Selvig
dialogue.line: This is it. The Water of Sight.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: In every realm, there's a reflection. If the water spirits accept me, I can return to my dream, and find what I missed.

dialogue.speaker: Erik Selvig
dialogue.line: The men who enter that water, the legends don't end well. [NEXUS Internet Hub, Oslo, Norway]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: A hacker who's faster than Ultron? He could be anywhere. And as this is the center of everything, I'm just a guy looking for a needle in the world's biggest haystack.

dialogue.speaker: World Hub Tech
dialogue.line: How do you find it?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Pretty simple. You bring a magnet. [he starts playfully singing as he conducts his search] Oh, I'm decrypting nuclear codes and you don't want me to. Come and get me. [back at the cave with Thor and Selvig, Thor is now in the water and goes back in his vision with Heimdall]

dialogue.speaker: Heimdall
dialogue.line: Wake up! [Thor starts getting electric charges going through his body]

dialogue.speaker: Erik Selvig
dialogue.line: Thor!

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: [he sees visions of Ultron] Extinction. [then he sees the creation of the Infinity Stones] [in Korea with Cho and Ultron]

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Helen Cho
dialogue.line: Cellular cohesion will take a few hours, but we can initiate the consciousness stream. We're uploading your cerebral matrix...now.

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: I can read him. He is dreaming.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Helen Cho
dialogue.line: I wouldn't call it dreams. It's Ultron's base consciousness, informational noise. Soon...

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: How soon? I'm not being pushy.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Helen Cho
dialogue.line: We're imprinting a physical brain. There are no shortcuts. Even if your magic gem is... [Wanda, reading Ultron's mind, sees a vision of global annihilation, which horrifies her and she screams]

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
