dialogue.line: How could you?

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: How could I what?

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: You said we would destroy the Avengers, make a better world.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: It will be better.

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: When everyone is dead.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: That is not...! The human race will have every opportunity to improve.

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: And if they don't?

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Ask Noah.

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: You're a madman.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: There were more than a dozen extinction level events before even the dinosaurs got theirs. When the Earth starts to settle, God throws a stone at it, and believe me, he's winding up. We have to evolve. There's no room for the weak.

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: And who decides who's weak? [as Ultron is distracted Wanda breaks the scepter's hold off of Cho]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Life. Life always decides. There's incoming. The Quinjet. We have to move. [Cho cancels the upload to Ultron's consciousness]

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Helen Cho
dialogue.line: That's not a problem. [Ultron blasts Cho, Wanda and Pietro run off]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Ah, wait, guys!. [he blasts Cho's technicians] They'll understand. When they see they'll understand. I just need a little more time. [unplugs himself from the Cradle]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: [Steve is on U-Gin Genetic Research Lab roof; to the others] Two minutes. Stay close. [inside the lab Steve finds Cho wounded] Dr. Cho!

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Helen Cho
dialogue.line: He's uploading himself into the body.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Where?

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Helen Cho
dialogue.line: The real power is inside the Cradle. The gem, its power is uncontainable. You can't just blow it up. You have to get the Cradle to Stark.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: First I have to find it.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Helen Cho
dialogue.line: Go.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: [on the Quinjet, listening to Steve on the radio comms] Did you guys copy that?

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: We did.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: I got a private jet taking off, across town, no manifest. That could be him.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: [noticing a truck leaving the lab] There. It's the truck from the lab. Right above you, Cap. On the loop by the bridge. It's them. I got three with the Cradle, one in the cab. I could take out the driver.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Negative! If that truck crashes, the gem could level the city. We need to draw out Ultron. [Steve jumps onto the roof of the truck]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: No, no, no, no, no. Leave me alone!

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: [Ultron blasts the truck door as Steve tries to enter] Well, he's definitely unhappy! I'm gonna try and keep him that way.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: You're not a match for him, Cap.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Thanks, Barton. [Ultron blasts Steve as he tries to enter the truck, but Steve manages to get back onto the truck's roof]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: You know what's in that Cradle? The power to make real change, and that terrifies you.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: I wouldn't call it a comfort. [Steve tries to fight with Ultron]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Stop it! [he throws Steve shield aside and blasts him]

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: [to Natasha] We got a window. Four, three...give 'em hell. [Natasha drops out of the Quinjet on a bike and rides towards the truck and picks up Steve's shield]

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: I'm always picking up after you boys.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: They're heading under the overpass, I've got no shot.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Which way?

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Hard right... Now. [Natasha heads over the truck, she throws Steve back his shield and he uses it to knock off Ultron from him]

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: [to the pedestrians on the pavement as she chases after the truck on her bike] Out of the way! Coming through! Sorry, coming through! [Steve continues his battle with Ultron on the truck]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Come on!

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Clint, can you draw out the guards?

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Let's find out.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: [to the pedestrians in her way] Beep beep! [Barton manages to draw out the Ultron sentries from the truck]

scene.description: [Steve later tackles Ultron into a train, the Ultron Sentries leave Barton and return to Ultron]

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Heading back towards you. So whatever you're going to do, do it now.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: I'm going in, Cap can you keep him occupied?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: [as he continues his battle with Ultron] What do you think I've been doing? [as Natasha enters the truck the Iron Legions head back, pick up the truck and lift off]

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: The package is airborne. I have a clean shot.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Negative. I am still in the truck.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: What the hell are you...?

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Just be ready, I'm sending the package to you.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: How do you want me to take it?

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Uhh, you might wish you hadn't asked that. [Pietro and Wanda turn up on the train to help Steve fight with Ultron]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Please. Don't do this.

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: What choice do we have? [Ultron flies off]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: I lost him! He's headed your way.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Nat, we gotta go. [Nat drops the cradle into the Quinjet but her foot gets caught by Ultron and she's pulled away]

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Nat! Cap, you see Nat?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: If you have the package, get it to Stark! Go!

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Do you have eyes on Nat?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Go! [reluctantly Barton takes off in the Quinjet; back on the train to the twins] Civilians in our path. [Pietro speeds off; to Wanda] Can you stop this thing? [as Pietro picks up civilians out of the way of the train Wanda uses her powers and stops the train] [after stopping the train Wanda goes over to an out of breath Pietro]

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: I'm fine. I just need to take a minute.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: I'm very tempted not to give you one.

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: The Cradle, did you get it?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Stark will take care of it.

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: No, he won't.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: You don't know what you're talking about, Stark's not crazy.

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: He will do anything to make things right.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Stark, come in. Stark. Anyone on comms?

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: Ultron can't tell the difference between saving the world and destroying it. Where do you think he gets that? [after Barton has taken the Cradle to Stark and Banner]

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Anything on Nat?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Haven't heard. But she's alive, or Ultron'd be rubbing our faces in it.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: This is sealed tight.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: We're going to need to access the program, break it down from within.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Hm. Any chance Natasha might leave you a message, outside the internet, old school spy stuff?

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: There's some nets I can cast. Yeah, alright. I'll find her. [Barton goes off]

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: I can work on tissue degeneration, if you can fry whatever operational system Cho implanted.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Yeah, about that. [Banner looks at Stark]

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: No.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: You have to trust me.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Kinda don't.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Our ally? The guy protecting the military's nuclear codes? I found him. [he brings up Jarvis's consciousness]

dialogue.speaker: JARVIS
dialogue.line: Hello, Dr. Banner.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Ultron didn't go after JARVIS cause he was angry. He attacked him because he was scared of what he can do. So JARVIS went underground. Okay? Scattered, dumped his memory. But not his protocols. He didn't even know he was in there, until I pieced him together.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: So, you want me to help you put JARVIS into this thing?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: No, of course not! I want to help you put JARVIS in this thing. [Banner shakes his head] We're out of my field here. You know bio-organics better than anyone.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: And you just assume that JARVIS' operational matrix can beat Ultron's?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: JARVIS has been beating him from inside without knowing it. This is the opportunity, we can create Ultron's perfect self, without the homicidal glitches he thinks are his winning personality. We have to.

dialogue.speaker: JARVIS
dialogue.line: I believe it's worth a go.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: No, I'm in a loop! I'm caught in a time loop, this is exactly where it all went wrong.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: I know, I know. I know what everyone's going to say, but they're already saying it. We're mad scientists. We're monsters, buddy. You gotta own it. Make a stand. [Banner shakes his head] It's not a loop. It's the end of the line.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: [as Natasha becomes conscious] I wasn't sure you'd wake up. I hoped you would, I wanted to show you something. I don't have anyone else. I think a lot about meteors, the purity of them. Boom! The end, start again. The world made clean for the new man to rebuild. I was meant to be new. I was meant to be beautiful. The world would've looked to the sky and seen hope, seen mercy. Instead they'll look up in horror because of you. You've wounded me. I give you full marks for that. But, like the man said, "What doesn't kill me[bigger body of Ultron's destroys him] "just makes me stronger." [locks Natasha in a cell] [Barton gets a Morse code message from Natasha which he's able to detect her location, at the same time Stark and Banner are experimenting on the synthetic body]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: This framework is not compatible.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: The genetic coding tower's at ninety-seven percent. You have got to upload that schematic in the next three minutes. [Steve and the twins turn up at the lab]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: I'm gonna say this once.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: How about "nonce"?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Shut it down!

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Nope, not gonna happen.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: You don't know what you're doing.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: And you do? She's not in your head?

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: I know you're angry.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Oh, we're way past that. I could choke the life out of you and never change a shade.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Banner, after everything that's happened...

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: That's nothing compared to what's coming!

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: You don't know what's in there!

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: This isn't a game...

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: The creature...! [Pietro uses his speed to destroy the lab equipment]

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: No, no. Go on. You were saying? [suddenly Barton shoots a bullet below caused the glass Pietro is standing to stand to smash and he falls through]

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: Pietro!

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: What? You didn't see that coming?

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: [to Wanda] Go ahead, piss me off. [just then Thor enters and pounds the cradle with his hammer, sending a powerful bolt of lightning that brings the body to life] Wait! [they all look in shock at the body who has JARVIS' voice and has become the Vision]

dialogue.speaker: Vision
dialogue.line: I'm sorry, that was...odd. [to Thor] Thank you.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Thor, you helped create this?

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: I've had a vision. A whirlpool that sucks in all hope of life and at it's center is that. [he points to the gem inside Vision's head]

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: What, the gem?

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: It's the Mind Stone. It's one of the six Infinity Stones, the greatest power in the universe, unparalleled in its destructive capabilities.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Then why would you bring it to...

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: Because Stark is right.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Oh, it's definitely the end times.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: The Avengers cannot defeat Ultron.

dialogue.speaker: Vision
dialogue.line: Not alone.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Why does your "vision" sound like JARVIS?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: We...we reconfigured JARVIS' matrix to create something new.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: I think I've had my fill of new.

dialogue.speaker: Vision
dialogue.line: You think I'm a child of Ultron?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: You're not?

dialogue.speaker: Vision
dialogue.line: I'm not Ultron. I'm not JARVIS. I am...I am.

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: I looked in your head and saw annihilation.

dialogue.speaker: Vision
dialogue.line: Look again.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Yeah. Her seal of approval means jack to me.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: Their powers, the horrors in our heads, Ultron himself, they all came from the Mind Stone, and they're nothing compared to what it can unleash. But with it on our side...

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Is it? Are you? On our side?

dialogue.speaker: Vision
dialogue.line: I don't think it's that simple.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Well it better get real simple real soon.

dialogue.speaker: Vision
dialogue.line: I am on the side of life. Ultron isn't, he will end it all.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: What's he waiting for?

dialogue.speaker: Vision
dialogue.line: You.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Where?

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Sokovia. He's got Nat there too.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: If we're wrong about you, if you're the monster that Ultron made you to be...

dialogue.speaker: Vision
dialogue.line: What will you do? [he looks at them all realizing they will destroy him] I don't want to kill Ultron. He's unique, and he's in pain. But that pain will roll over the earth, so he must be destroyed. Every form he's built, every trace of his presence on the net, we have to act now. And not one of us can do it without the others. Maybe I am a monster. I don't think I'd know if I were one. I'm not what you are, and not what you intended. So there may be no way to make you trust me. But we need to go. [he holds up Thor's hammer and hands it to him, Vision walks off and everyone stares in shock]

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: Right. [pats Stark on the shoulder] Well done.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: [to the others] Three minutes. Get what you need. [they all start getting ready to leave, Stark loads up FRIDAY into his Iron Man suit now that JARVIS is no longer available]

dialogue.speaker: FRIDAY
dialogue.line: Good evening, boss.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: No way we all get through this. If even one tin soldier is left standing, we've lost. It's gonna be blood on the floor.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: I got no plans tomorrow night.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: I get first crack at the big guy. Iron Man's the one he's waiting for.

dialogue.speaker: Vision
dialogue.line: [walks past] That's true, he hates you the most.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Ultron knows we're coming. Odds are we'll be riding into heavy fire, and that's what we signed up for. But the people of Sokovia, they didn't. So our priority is getting them out. [Pietro speeds into the Sokovian police station]

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: We're under attack! Clear the city, now! [no one takes this seriously so Pietro returns, takes a shotgun and starts shooting in the air] Get off your asses. [Wanda uses her mind powers on the people of Sokovia to get them to evacuate]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: All they want is to live their lives in peace, and that's not going to happen today. But we can do our best to protect them. And we can get the job done, and find out what Ultron's been building. We find Romanoff, and we clear the field. Keep the fight between us. Ultron thinks we're monsters and we're what's wrong with the world. This isn't just about beating him. It's about whether he's right.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: [inside her cell Natasha hears Banner's voice] Natasha! Natasha!

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Bruce?

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: [he walks over to her cell] You alright?

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Yeah.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: The team's in the city, it's about to light up.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: I don't suppose you found a key lying around somewhere?

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: Yeah, I did. [holds up gun and blasts the cell door open]

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: So what's our play?

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: I'm here to get you to safety.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Job's not finished.

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: We could help with the evacuation, but I can't be in a fight near civilians. And you've done plenty. Our fight is over.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: So we just disappear? [as the city is being evacuated]

dialogue.speaker: FRIDAY
dialogue.line: Your man's in the church, boss. I think he's waiting for you. [Stark flies into the church]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Come to confess your sins?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: I don't know, how much time you got?

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: More than you.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Uhhh. Have you been juicing? A little Vibranium cocktail? You're looking, I don't wanna say, puffy...

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: You're stalling to protect the people.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Well, that is the mission. Did you forget?

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: I've moved beyond your mission. I'm free. [suddenly the Vibranium core he's placed beneath the floor erupts] What, you think you're the only one stalling?

dialogue.speaker: FRIDAY
dialogue.line: There's the rest of the Vibranium. Function: still unclear.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: This is how you end, Tony. This is peace in my time. [Ultron's army of robots start attacking the city as everyone is evacuating]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Go!

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: Get off the bridge! Run! [Vision then finds Ultron]

dialogue.speaker: Vision
dialogue.line: Ultron.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: My Vision. They really did take everything from me.

dialogue.speaker: Vision
dialogue.line: You set the terms, you can change them.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Alright. [they start battling it out]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: FRIDAY! The Vision?

dialogue.speaker: FRIDAY
dialogue.line: Boss, it's working. He's burning Ultron out of the net, he won't escape through there.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: [to the Vision] You shut me out! You think I care? You take away my world, I take away yours. [he activates the Vibranium core and the earth around Sokovia starts to shake and break]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: FRIDAY?

dialogue.speaker: FRIDAY
dialogue.line: Sokovia's going for a ride. [as Sokovia is being destroyed]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Do you see? The beauty of it, the inevitability. You rise, only to fall. You, Avengers, you are my meteor, my swift and terrible sword and the earth will crack with the weight of your failure. Purge me from your computers, turn my own flesh against me. It means nothing. When the dust settles, the only thing living in this world will be metal. [as the earth is shaking falling in around them]

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: We gotta move.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: You're not going to turn green?

dialogue.speaker: Bruce Banner
dialogue.line: I've got a compelling reason not to lose my cool.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: I adore you. [she kisses Banner then pushes him off the edge] But I need the other guy. [the Hulk jumps up in front of her] Let's finish the job. [with Natasha on his back yelling in fright, Hulk gets into the city] I really hope this makes us even. Now go be a hero. [Hulk goes off and Natasha rushes off in the opposite direction]

dialogue.speaker: FRIDAY
dialogue.line: The Vibranium core has got a magnetic field, that's what's keeping the rock together.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: If it drops?

dialogue.speaker: FRIDAY
dialogue.line: Right now the impact would kill thousands. Once it gets high enough: Global extinction. [Stark flies towards the city and a building starts to collapse as the ground shakes] That building's not clear, Tenth floor. [Stark flies in to find a family still in their apartment]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Hi. Okay. Get in the tub! [Stark flies the family in the tub out of the collapsing building]

dialogue.speaker: FRIDAY
dialogue.line: I got airborne, heading up to the bridge.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Cap, you got incoming.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Incoming already came in. Stark, you worry about bringing the city back down safely. The rest of us have one job: tear these things apart. You get hurt, hurt 'em back. You get killed, walk it off. [Barton gets Wanda out of the way and into a building as Ultron's robots attach the city]

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Go, go, move!

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: How could I let this happen? [Wanda starts to break down]

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Hey, hey, you okay?

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: This is all our fault.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Hey, look at me. It's your fault, it's everyone's fault, who cares. Are you up for this? Are you? Look, I just need to know, cause the city is flying. Okay, look, the city is flying, we're fighting an army of robots, and I have a bow and arrow. None of this makes sense. But I'm going back out there because it's my job. Okay? And I can't do my job and babysit. It doesn't matter what you did, or what you were. If you go out there, you fight, and you fight to kill. Stay in here, you're good, I'll send your brother to come find you, but if you step out that door, you are an Avenger. [Wanda just looks at him] Alright, good chat. [he gets up and gets ready to leave] Yeah, the city is flying. [he leaves and starts shooting his arrows at the robots]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: [to the woman Thor threw over to Steve after her car fell of the edge of a collapsing bridge] I got you! Just look at me. [Steve helps her up to safety]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: You can't save them all. You'll never... [he throws off one of the attacking robots off the edge of the bridge]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: You'll never what? You didn't finish! [Thor lands on the bridge on the top of the woman's car he was saving] What, were you napping?

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: [as Thor and Steve are fighting off the robots] Thor! You're bothering me. [as Barton is fighting off the robots Wanda suddenly comes out of the building and starts to use her powers on the robots to destroy them]

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Alright, we're all clear here.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: We are not clear! We are very not clear!

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Alright, coming to you. [just then Pietro speeds in, picks up Wanda and leaves]

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: Keep up old man! [Barton holds his arrow to aim it at Pietro]

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: Nobody would know. Nobody. "The last I saw him, when Ultron was sitting on him. Uh...yeah, he'll be missed, that quick little bastard. I miss him already."

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: [as Natasha joins them in their battle with the robots] Romanoff! [he throws his shield at her so she can use it to protect herself from the attacking robot]

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Thanks. [back to Stark]

dialogue.speaker: FRIDAY
dialogue.line: The anti-gravs are rigged to flip. Touch 'em, they'll go full reverse thrust. The city's not coming down slow.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: The spire's Vibranium. If I get Thor to hit it...

dialogue.speaker: FRIDAY
dialogue.line: It'll crack, but that's not enough, the impact would still be devastating.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Maybe if we cap the other end, keep the atomic action doubling back.

dialogue.speaker: FRIDAY
dialogue.line: That could vaporize the city, and everyone on it.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: The next wave's gonna hit any minute. What have you got, Stark?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Well, nothing great. Maybe a way to blow up the city. That'll keep it from impacting the surface if you guys can get clear.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: I asked for a solution, not an escape plan.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Impact radius is getting bigger every second. We're going to have to make a choice.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Cap, these people are going nowhere. If Stark finds a way to blow this rock...

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Not 'til everyone's safe.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Everyone up here versus everyone down there? There's no math there.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: I'm not leaving this rock with one civilian on it.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: I didn't say we should leave. [Steve turns to look at her] There's worse ways to go. Where else am I gonna get a view like this?

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: [voice] Glad you like the view, Romanoff. It's about to get better. [just then the Helicarrier show up] [inside the Helicarrier] Nice, right? I pulled her out of mothballs with a couple of old friends. She's dusty, but she'll do.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Fury, you son of a bitch.

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: Oooh! You kiss your mother with that mouth?

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: Altitude is eighteen thousand and climbing.

dialogue.speaker: Specialist Cameron Klein
dialogue.line: Lifeboats secure to deploy. Disengage in three, two...take 'em out. [as they watch the lifeboats fly in towards the them]

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: This is SHIELD?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: This is what SHIELD's supposed to be.

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: This is not so bad.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Let's load 'em up.

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: Sir, we have multiple bogies converging on our starboard flank.

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: Show 'em what we got.

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: You're up. [Rhodes shows up in his War Machine suit and blasts one of the robots]

dialogue.speaker: James Rhodes
dialogue.line: Yes! Now this is gonna be a good story.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Yep. If you live to tell it.

dialogue.speaker: James Rhodes
dialogue.line: You think I can't hold my own?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: We get through this, I'll hold your own.

dialogue.speaker: James Rhodes
dialogue.line: You had to make it weird.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: [as the team helps the people onto the Helicarrier lifeboats] Alright, let's load 'em up! Alright, here we go. Here we go, let's move. Let's go everyone!

dialogue.speaker: Specialist Cameron Klein
dialogue.line: Number six boat is topped and locked. Or, uh, or stocked, topped. It...it's, uh, full of people.

dialogue.speaker: Maria Hill
dialogue.line: Incoming! [one of the robots flies in and crashes inside the Helicarrier]

dialogue.speaker: Specialist Cameron Klein
dialogue.line: Oh, God! [Hill shoots at it and Fury stabs in with a piece of metal, destroying it]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: [as he's hitting Thor] You think you're saving anyone? I turn that key and drop this rock a little early and it's still billions dead. Even you can't stop that.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: I am Thor, son of Odin, and as long as there is life in my breast, I am...running out of things to say! Are you ready? [Vision uses Thor's hammer to hit Ultron, Vision then throws the hammer back to Thor]

dialogue.speaker: Vision
dialogue.line: It's terribly well balanced.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: Well, if there's too much weight, you lose power on the swing, so.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: I got it! Create a heat seal. I can...I can supercharge the spire from below.

dialogue.speaker: FRIDAY
dialogue.line: Running numbers. [Stark fights off the robots from the Helicarrier's lifeboats] A heat seal could work with enough power.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Thor, I got a plan!

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: We're out of time. They're coming for the core.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Rhodey, get the rest of the people on board that carrier.

dialogue.speaker: James Rhodes
dialogue.line: On it.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Avengers, time to work for a living.

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: [the rest of the team joins Thor and Vision] You good?

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: Yeah.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Romanoff? You and Banner better not be playing "hide the zucchini."

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Relax, Shell-head. Not all of us can fly. [as she joins the rest of the team] What's the drill?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: [points to the Vibranium core] This is the drill. If Ultron gets a hand on the core, we lose. [Ultron shows up]

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: Is that the best you can do? [Ultron summons his army of robots to join him]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: You had to ask.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: This is the best I can do. This is exactly what I wanted. All of you, against all of me. How could you possibly hope to stop me?

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Well, like the old man said. Together. [they all fight off Ultron's attacking robots]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: You know, with the benefit of hindsight.... [suddenly Hulk knocks him far away and the robots start to retreat]

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: They'll try to leave the city.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: We can't let 'em, not even one. Rhodey!

dialogue.speaker: James Rhodes
dialogue.line: I'm on it. [to the approaching robots] Oh, no, I didn't say you could leave. War Machine, comin' at you, right ... [just then Vision flies in and helps to destroy the robots] Okay, what?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: We gotta move out. Even I can tell the air is getting thin. You guys get to the boats, I'll sweep for stragglers, be right behind you.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: What about the core?

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: I'll protect it. It's my job.

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: [Steve, Barton and Natasha leave; to Pietro] Get the people on the boats.

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: I'm not going to leave you here.

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: I can handle this. [just then she blasts off an approaching robot] Come back for me when everyone else is off, not before.

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: Hmm.

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: You understand?

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: You know, I'm twelve minutes older than you. [Wanda chuckles]

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: Go.

dialogue.speaker: FRIDAY
dialogue.line: Boss, power levels are way below opt...

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Re-route everything. We get one shot at this. [Barton and Natasha are making their way to the lifeboats]

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: I know what I need to do. The dining room! If I knock out that east wall, it'll make a nice work space for Laura, huh? Put up some baffling, she can't hear the kids running around, what do you think?

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: You guys always eat in the kitchen anyway.

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: No one eats in a dining room. [they reach the lifeboats] We don't have a lot of time.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: So get your ass on a boat. [Natasha finds the Hulk] Hey, big guy. Sun's getting real low. [Barton gets onto one of the lifeboats, but notices a woman calling out for her brother]

dialogue.speaker: Zrinka
dialogue.line: Costel? We were in the market. Costel?! [Barton runs off to find the boy]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Thor, I'm gonna need you back in the church.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: [referring to the people getting onto the lifeboats] Is this the last of them?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Yeah. Everyone else is on the carrier.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: You know, if this works, we maybe don't walk away.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: Maybe not. [just as Natasha tries to calm Hulk down to get him back to being Banner Ultron flies in with a jet and starts shooting at them]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: [sings] I got no strings, so I have fun. I'm not tied up to anyone. [as Barton is saving the boy, Costel, Ultron starts shooting at them but Pietro intervenes and takes the shots to save them]

dialogue.speaker: Pietro Maximoff
dialogue.line: You didn't see that coming. [Pietro falls to the ground as he dies, Wanda senses his death, causing her to fall in despair] [Hulk drops Natasha off onto the Helicarrier and then jumps onto the jet Ultron is on]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Oh, for God's sake! [Hulk knocks Ultron out of the jet and he crashes inside a train; at the same time Barton delivers Costel safely to his sister onto the lifeboat, a man goes over to help him with his wound]

dialogue.speaker: Clint Barton
dialogue.line: No, no. I'm fine. [Barton lies down next to the dead body of Pietro] Oh, it's been a long day. [Wanda then finds the Ultron]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Wanda, if you stay here, you'll die.

dialogue.speaker: Wanda Maximoff
dialogue.line: I just did. Do you know how it felt? [she uses her power to rip Ultron's core out of his body] It felt like that. [Stark fires a powerful blast to the core underneath the floating city]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Thor, on my mark. [Thor brings on a blast of lightning, at the same time Vision flies in, picks up Wanda and flies off with as the city is being destroyed] Now! [Thor uses his hammer to hit the Vibranium core in the church, destroying the core and the floating city]

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: [to Hulk as he remains on the jet he knocked Ultron out of] Hey, big guy. We did it, the job's finished. Now I need you to turn this bird around, okay? We can't track you in stealth mode, so help me out. I need you t... [Hulk turns off Nat's camera, then sits as the jet flies off to an unknown destination, at the same time Vision finds Ultron]

dialogue.speaker: Vision
dialogue.line: You're afraid.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: Of you?

dialogue.speaker: Vision
dialogue.line: Of death. You're the last one.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: You were supposed to be the last. Stark asked for a savior, and settled for a slave.

dialogue.speaker: Vision
dialogue.line: I suppose we're both disappointments. [Ultron chuckles]

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: I suppose we are.

dialogue.speaker: Vision
dialogue.line: Humans are odd. They think order and chaos are somehow opposites, and try to control what won't be. But there is grace in their failings. I think you missed that.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: They're doomed.

dialogue.speaker: Vision
dialogue.line: Yes. But a thing isn't beautiful because it lasts. It's a privilege to be among them.

dialogue.speaker: Ultron
dialogue.line: You're unbearably naive.

dialogue.speaker: Vision
dialogue.line: Well, I was born yesterday. [as Ultron goes to attack him Vision uses the infinity stone in his head to destroy him]

dialogue.speaker: Laura Barton
dialogue.line: [we see Barton returning to his family on the farm, then we see Stark driving to the new Avengers facility in upstate New York; Natasha looks at Barton's new baby on her phone] Say hi to Auntie Nat. [Natasha sees the baby has been named Nathaniel Pietro Barton]

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Fat.

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: One of our tech boys flagged this, splashed down in the Banda Sea. Could be the Quinjet. But with Stark's stealth tech, we still can't track the damn thing.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Right.

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: Probably jumped out and swam to Fiji. He'll send a postcard.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: "Wish you were here." You sent me to recruit him, way back when. Did you know then what was going to happen?

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: You never know. You hope for the best and make do with what you get. I got a great team.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Nothing lasts forever.

dialogue.speaker: Nick Fury
dialogue.line: Trouble, Miss Romanoff. No matter who wins or loses, trouble still comes around.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: The rules have changed.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: We're dealing with something new.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Well, the Vision's artificial intelligence.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: A machine.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: So it doesn't count.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: No. It's not like a person lifting the hammer.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Right. Different rules for us.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Nice guy, but artificial.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Thank you.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: If he can wield the hammer, he can keep the Mind Stone. It's safe with the Vision and these days, safe is in short supply.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: But if you put the hammer in an elevator...

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: It would still go up.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Elevator's not worthy.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: I'm going to miss these little talks of ours.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Well, not if you don't leave.

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: I have no choice. The Mind Stone is the fourth of the Infinity Stones to show up in the last few years. That's not a coincidence. Someone has been playing an intricate game and has made pawns of us. But once all these pieces are in position...

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Triple Yahtzee?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: You think you can find out what's coming?

dialogue.speaker: Thor
dialogue.line: I do. Besides this one, there's nothing that can't be explained. [Thor returns to Asgard which burns a circle in the grass he was standing on]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: That man has no regard for lawn maintenance. I'm gonna miss him though. And you're gonna miss me. There's gonna be a lot of manful tears. [as they walk over towards Stark's car]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: I will miss you, Tony.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: Yeah? Well, it's time for me to tap out. Maybe I should take a page out of Barton's book and build Pepper a farm, hope nobody blows it up.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: The simple life.

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: You'll get there one day.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: I don't know, family, stability. The guy who wanted all that went in the ice seventy-five years ago. I think someone else came out. [Stark turns to get into his car]

dialogue.speaker: Tony Stark
dialogue.line: You alright?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: I'm home. [last lines; Steve finds Natasha standing alone] You want to keep staring at the wall, or do you want to go to work? I mean, it's a pretty interesting wall.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: I thought you and Tony were still gazing into each other's eyes. How do we look?

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Well, we're not the '27 Yankees. [hands Natasha a tablet]

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: We've got some hitters.

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: They're good. They're not a team.

dialogue.speaker: Natasha Romanoff
dialogue.line: Let's beat 'em into shape. [they gather Rhodes in his War Machine suit, Sam in his Falcon suit, Wanda in a new suit, and Vision]

dialogue.speaker: Steve Rogers
dialogue.line: Avengers...!

scene.description: [mid-credits scene; we see the Infinity Gauntlet without any of the Stones, dissatisfied Thanos opens a vault and puts on The Infinty Gauntlet, revealing himself]

dialogue.speaker: Thanos
dialogue.line: Fine, I'll do it myself.

scene.description: [End of Avengers: Age of Ultron]
